name: Kahakuhale Serevi
story: Kahakuhale Serevi was born and raised on the island of Martinique in the Caribbean. He joined the French army at the age of 18, hoping to see the world and experience adventure. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his natural talent with a rifle and his fearlessness in the face of danger. However, his aggressive nature often leads to conflicts with his superiors and fellow soldiers. Despite this, his skills and determination make him a valuable asset to any mission.
